docna.cdata!:
Peru - Pisco Port Project : Loan 0446 - Loan
            Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Peru - Pisco Port Project : Loan
            0446 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed loan would help finance:
            (a) the construction of new port facilities at Pisco
            consisting of a four berth marginal wharf and related
            facilities; (b) feasibility studies in connection with the
            ocean port of Chimbote and four river ports; (c) improving
            port operations and procedures, including carrying out
            personnel training.
